General Info

full name Simone Maria Giancola
date of birth 6th September 1999
email simonegiancola09 dot gmail dot com
summary Researcher. Passionate about using theoretical methodologies to solve real world problems.
languages English (proficient), Italian (mothertongue), French (Intermediate), Spanish (basic)
